channel.title: owlchaser on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in owlchaser on Barefoot Rob

item.title: email to Gary
item.description: 07:27 Thursday 25 February 2016 JST Gary! We were just approved for a house loan to buy our first house! It's 20km from the coast (20 x further than now, so safer from tsunamis), larger than our current rental house, and half the monthly cost! yay! It's all electric, so when free energy technology is released, we'll be ready! My train commutes will be longer, so I plan to spend more time drawing my art https://art.
